2164.subject: MPA
2164.course_title_long: Music & Performance:  Theatrical Approaches to Musical Performance
2164.descrlong: Using principles of theater and active storytelling, students will create a narrative idea for a musical performance before a live audience, based on  principles of dramatic structure and using production elements such as stage setting, lighting, incidental sound, and visual effects.  Through practical experimentation, students will create a music CD, however, the project can be stored on a DVD or video that can be fully realized in their capstone.
